name: 蘇至善
objective: 本課程將探討熱力學中之流體相平衡議題,並針對特定相平衡行為之實驗量測與關連進行說明,同時介紹超臨界流體技術之發展與應用
schedule:
1. Phase behavior of pure fluids
2. Thermodynamic properties of mixture
3. Gibbs energy calculation
4. Mixture VLE
5. Mixture SLE
6. Supercritical fluid technology
scorePolicy:
期中考試(30 %),
期末考試(45 %)
期末報告(25 %)
(暫定)
materials: Sandler, S. I.,  Chemical, Biochemical and Engineering Thermodynamics, 4th ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc., N. Y. (2005)
